properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Holy Lord, we worship You Almighty God our hearts cry out before You There is no other One like You. Holy, holy and worthy, worthy are You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Lord, from above Fill us up with Your love. For my heart and my flesh Cry out for You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Son of God, Righteous One By Your grace we have come Into Your presence, Holy God To sing your praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Lord, from above Fill us up with Your love. For my heart and my flesh Cry out for You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, so holy (sisters) Almighty God, so holy (brothers) Holy, so holy (all) There is no other as holy.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy, so worthy (sisters) Almighty God, so worthy (brothers) Worthy, so worthy (all) There is no other as worthy.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, O Jesus (all) Almighty God, Lord Jesus Jesus, Lord Jesus Almighty God, Lord Jesus.{/lang-eng}
